verses.verse: בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> The sons יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah פֶּ֧רֶץ <WH6557> Pharez חֶצְר֛וֹן <WH2696> Hezron וְכַרְמִ֖י <WH3756> and Carmi וְח֥וּר <WH2354> and Hur וְשׁוֹבָֽל׃ <WH7732> and Shobal

וּרְאָיָ֤ה <WH7211> And Reaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son שׁוֹבָל֙ <WH7732> of Shobal הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יַ֔חַת <WH3189> Jahath וְיַ֣חַת <WH3189> and Jahath הֹלִ֔יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחוּמַ֖י <WH267> Ahumai וְאֶת־ <WH853> לָ֑הַד <WH3855> and Lahad אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <WH4940> These [are] the families הַצָּֽרְעָתִֽי׃ <WH6882> of the Zorathites ס

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> These אֲבִ֣י <WH1> And these [were of] the father עֵיטָ֔ם <WH5862> of Etam יִזְרְעֶ֥אל <WH3157> Jezreel וְיִשְׁמָ֖א <WH3457> and Ishma וְיִדְבָּ֑שׁ <WH3031> and Idbash וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name אֲחוֹתָ֖ם <WH269> of their sister הַצְלֶלְפּֽוֹנִי׃ <WH6753> [was] Hazelelponi

וּפְנוּאֵל֙ <WH6439> And Penuel אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father גְדֹ֔ר <WH1446> of Gedor וְעֵ֖זֶר <WH5829> and Ezer אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father חוּשָׁ֑ה <WH2364> of Hushah אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵי־ <WH1121> These [are] the sons חוּר֙ <WH2354> of Hur בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn אֶפְרָ֔תָה <WH672> of Ephratah אֲבִ֖י <WH1> the father בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> of Bethlehem

וּלְאַשְׁחוּר֙ <WH806> And Ashur אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father תְק֔וֹעַ <WH8620> of Tekoa הָי֖וּ <WH1961> had שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> had two נָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> wives חֶלְאָ֖ה <WH2458> Helah וְנַעֲרָֽה׃ <WH5292> and Naarah

וַתֵּ֨לֶד <WH3205> bare ל֤וֹ נַעֲרָה֙ <WH5292> And Naarah אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֻזָּ֣ם <WH275> him Ahuzam וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֵ֔פֶר <WH2660> and Hepher וְאֶת־ <WH853> תֵּימְנִ֖י <WH8488> and Temeni וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲחַשְׁתָּרִ֑י <WH326> and Haahashtari אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> These [were] the sons נַעֲרָֽה׃ <WH5292> of Naarah
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons חֶלְאָ֑ה <WH2458> of Helah צֶ֥רֶת <WH6889> [were] Zereth [יִצְחָר כ] (וְצֹ֖חַר <WH3328> Jitschar ק) וְאֶתְנָֽן׃ <WH869> and Ethnan

וְק֣וֹץ <WH6976> And Coz הוֹלִ֔יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עָנ֖וּב <WH6036> Anub וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַצֹּבֵבָ֑ה <WH6637> and Zobebah וּמִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <WH4940> and the families אֲחַרְחֵ֖ל <WH316> of Aharhel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הָרֽוּם׃ <WH2037> of Harum

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become יַעְבֵּ֔ץ <WH3258> And Jabez נִכְבָּ֖ד <WH3513> was more honourable מֵאֶחָ֑יו <WH251> than his brethren וְאִמּ֗וֹ <WH517> and his mother קָרְאָ֨ה <WH7121> called שְׁמ֤וֹ <WH8034> his name יַעְבֵּץ֙ <WH3258> Jabez לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because יָלַ֖דְתִּי <WH3205> Because I bare בְּעֹֽצֶב׃ <WH6090> him with sorrow

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called יַ֠עְבֵּץ <WH3258> And Jabez לֵאלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> on the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying אִם־ <WH518> Oh that בָּרֵ֨ךְ <WH1288> thou wouldest bless תְּבָרֲכֵ֜נִי <WH1288> me indeed וְהִרְבִּ֤יתָ <WH7235> and enlarge אֶת־ <WH853> גְּבוּלִי֙ <WH1366> my coast וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become יָדְךָ֙ <WH3027> and that thine hand עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> would וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> might be with me and that thou wouldest keep מֵּרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> [me] from evil לְבִלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> that may not עָצְבִּ֑י <WH6087> that it may not grieve וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> granted אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> me And God אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what שָׁאָֽל׃ <WH7592> him that which he requested

וּכְל֥וּב <WH3620> And Chelub אֲחִֽי־ <WH251> the brother שׁוּחָ֖ה <WH7746> of Shuah הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> מְחִ֑יר <WH4243> Mehir ה֖וּא <WH1931> who אֲבִ֥י <WH1> which [was] the father אֶשְׁתּֽוֹן׃ <WH850> of Eshton

וְאֶשְׁתּ֗וֹן <WH850> And Eshton הוֹלִ֞יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית רָפָא֙ <WH1051> Bethrapha וְאֶת־ <WH853> פָּסֵ֔חַ <WH6454> and Paseah וְאֶת־ <WH853> תְּחִנָּ֖ה <WH8468> and Tehinnah אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father עִ֣יר נָחָ֑שׁ <WH5904> of Irnahash אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> are the men רֵכָֽה׃ <WH7397> of Rechah ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons קְנַ֔ז <WH7073> of Kenaz עָתְנִיאֵ֖ל <WH6274> Othniel וּשְׂרָיָ֑ה <WH8304> and Seraiah וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the sons עָתְנִיאֵ֖ל <WH6274> of Othniel חֲתַֽת׃ <WH2867> Hathath

וּמְעוֹנֹתַ֖י <WH4587> And Meonothai הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עָפְרָ֑ה <WH6084> Ophrah וּשְׂרָיָ֗ה <WH8304> and Seraiah הוֹלִ֤יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> Joab אֲבִי֙ <WH1> the father גֵּ֣יא <WH1516> of the valley חֲרָשִׁ֔ים <WH2798> of Charashim כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חֲרָשִׁ֖ים <WH2796> were craftsmen הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become פ

וּבְנֵי֙ <WH1121> And the sons כָּלֵ֣ב <WH3612> of Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּ֔ה <WH3312> of Jephunneh עִ֥ירוּ <WH5900> Iru אֵלָ֖ה <WH425> Elah וָנָ֑עַם <WH5277> and Naam וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the sons אֵלָ֖ה <WH425> of Elah וּקְנַֽז׃ <WH7073> even Kenaz
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons יְהַלֶּלְאֵ֑ל <WH3094> of Jehaleleel זִ֣יף <WH2128> Ziph וְזִיפָ֔ה <WH2129> and Ziphah תִּירְיָ֖א <WH8493> Tiria וַאֲשַׂרְאֵֽל׃ <WH840> and Asareel

וּבֶן־ <WH1121> And the sons עֶזְרָ֔ה <WH5834> of Ezra יֶ֥תֶר <WH3500> [were] Jether וּמֶ֖רֶד <WH4778> and Mered וְעֵ֣פֶר <WH6081> and Epher וְיָל֑וֹן <WH3210> and Jalon וַתַּ֙הַר֙ <WH2029> and she bare אֶת־ <WH853> מִרְיָ֣ם <WH4813> Miriam וְאֶת־ <WH853> שַׁמַּ֔י <WH8060> and Shammai וְאֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׁבָּ֖ח <WH3431> and Ishbah אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father אֶשְׁתְּמֹֽעַ׃ <WH851> of Eshtemoa

וְאִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <WH802> And his wife הַיְהֻדִיָּ֗ה <WH3057> Jehudijah יָלְדָ֞ה <WH3205> bare אֶת־ <WH853> יֶ֨רֶד <WH3382> Jered אֲבִ֤י <WH1> the father גְדוֹר֙ <WH1446> of Gedor וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH2268> and Heber אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father שׂוֹכ֔וֹ <WH7755> of Socho וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְקֽוּתִיאֵ֖ל <WH3354> and Jekuthiel אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father זָנ֑וֹחַ <WH2182> of Zanoah וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> another בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> And these [are] the sons בִּתְיָ֣ה <WH1332> of Bithiah בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לָקַ֖ח <WH3947> took מָֽרֶד׃ <WH4778> which Mered ס

וּבְנֵי֙ <WH1121> And the sons אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> of [his] wife הֽוֹדִיָּ֔ה <WH1940> Hodiah אֲח֣וֹת <WH269> the sister נַ֔חַם <WH5163> of Naham אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father קְעִילָ֖ה <WH7084> of Keilah הַגַּרְמִ֑י <WH1636> the Garmite וְאֶשְׁתְּמֹ֖עַ <WH851> and Eshtemoa הַמַּעֲכָתִֽי׃ <WH4602> the Maachathite

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons שִׁימ֔וֹן <WH7889> of Shimon אַמְנ֣וֹן <WH550> [were] Amnon וְרִנָּ֔ה <WH7441> and Rinnah בֶּן־ חָנָ֖ן <WH1135> Benhanan [וְתֹולֹון כ] (וְתִילֹ֑ון <WH8436> birth ק) וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons יִשְׁעִ֔י <WH3469> of Ishi זוֹחֵ֖ת <WH2105> [were] Zoheth וּבֶן־ זוֹחֵֽת׃ <WH1132> and Benzoheth

בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> The sons שֵׁלָ֣ה <WH7956> of Shelah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah עֵ֚ר <WH6147> [were] Er אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father לֵכָ֔ה <WH3922> of Lecah וְלַעְדָּ֖ה <WH3935> and Laadah אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father מָרֵשָׁ֑ה <WH4762> of Mareshah וּמִשְׁפְּח֛וֹת <WH4940> and the families בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house עֲבֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> of them that wrought הַבֻּ֖ץ <WH948> fine linen לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> of the house אַשְׁבֵּֽעַ׃ <WH791> of Ashbea

וְיוֹקִ֞ים <WH3137> And Jokim וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> and the men כֹזֵבָ֗א <WH3578> of Chozeba וְיוֹאָ֧שׁ <WH3101> and Joash וְשָׂרָ֛ף <WH8315> and Saraph אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּעֲל֥וּ <WH1166> who had the dominion לְמוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> in Moab וְיָשֻׁ֣בִי לָ֑חֶם <WH3433> and Jashubilehem וְהַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> things עַתִּיקִֽים׃ <WH6267> And [these are] ancient

הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> These הַיּ֣וֹצְרִ֔ים <WH3335> These [were] the potters וְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> and those that dwelt נְטָעִ֖ים <WH5196> among plants וּגְדֵרָ֑ה <WH1449> Gederah עִם־ <WH5973> with הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> with the king בִּמְלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <WH4399> for his work יָ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> there they dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there ס
בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> The sons שִׁמְע֑וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon נְמוּאֵ֣ל <WH5241> [were] Nemuel וְיָמִ֔ין <WH3226> and Jamin יָרִ֖יב <WH3402> Jarib זֶ֥רַח <WH2226> Zerah שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> [and] Shaul
שַׁלֻּ֥ם <WH7967> Shallum בְּנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son מִבְשָׂ֥ם <WH4017> Mibsam בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son מִשְׁמָ֥ע <WH4927> Mishma בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons מִשְׁמָ֑ע <WH4927> of Mishma חַמּוּאֵ֥ל <WH2536> Hamuel בְּנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son זַכּ֥וּר <WH2139> Zacchur בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son שִׁמְעִ֥י <WH8096> Shimei בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

וּלְשִׁמְעִ֞י <WH8096> And Shimei בָּנִ֨ים <WH1121> sons שִׁשָּׁ֤ה <WH8337> and six עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> teen וּבָנ֣וֹת <WH1323> daughters שֵׁ֔שׁ <WH8337> and six וּלְאֶחָ֕יו <WH251> but his brethren אֵ֖ין <WH369> have בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> children רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> had not many וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all מִשְׁפַּחְתָּ֔ם <WH4940> neither did all their family לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor הִרְבּ֖וּ <WH7235> multiply עַד־ <WH5704> like בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> like to the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah ס
וַיֵּֽשְׁב֛וּ <WH3427> And they dwelt בִּבְאֵֽר־ שֶׁ֥בַע <WH884> at Beersheba וּמוֹלָדָ֖ה <WH4137> and Moladah וַחֲצַ֥ר שׁוּעָֽל׃ <WH2705> and Hazarshual
וּבְבִלְהָ֥ה <WH1090> And at Bilhah וּבְעֶ֖צֶם <WH6107> and at Ezem וּבְתוֹלָֽד׃ <WH8434> and at Tolad
וּבִבְתוּאֵ֥ל <WH1328> And at Bethuel וּבְחָרְמָ֖ה <WH2767> and at Hormah וּבְצִֽיקְלָֽג׃ <WH6860> and at Ziklag

וּבְבֵ֤ית מַרְכָּבוֹת֙ <WH1024> And at Bethmarcaboth וּבַחֲצַ֣ר סוּסִ֔ים <WH2702> and Hazarsusim וּבְבֵ֥ית בִּרְאִ֖י <WH1011> and at Bethbirei וּֽבְשַׁעֲרָ֑יִם <WH8189> and at Shaaraim אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These עָרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5892> These [were] their cities עַד־ <WH5704> until מְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> unto the reign דָּוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> of David

וְחַצְרֵיהֶם֙ <WH2691> And their villages עֵיטָ֣ם <WH5862> [were] Etam וָעַ֔יִן <WH5871> and Ain רִמּ֥וֹן <WH7417> Rimmon וְתֹ֖כֶן <WH8507> and Tochen וְעָשָׁ֑ן <WH6228> and Ashan עָרִ֖ים <WH5892> cities חָמֵֽשׁ׃ <WH2568> five

וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חַצְרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH2691> And all their villages אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> were סְבִיב֛וֹת <WH5439> that [were] round about הֶעָרִ֥ים <WH5892> the same cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> the same עַד־ <WH5704> far בָּ֑עַל <WH1168> unto Baal זֹ֚את <WH2063> likewise מוֹשְׁבֹתָ֔ם <WH4186> These [were] their habitations וְהִתְיַחְשָׂ֖ם <WH3187> and their genealogy לָהֶֽם׃
וּמְשׁוֹבָ֣ב <WH4877> And Meshobab וְיַמְלֵ֔ךְ <WH3230> and Jamlech וְיוֹשָׁ֖ה <WH3144> and Joshah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲמַצְיָֽה׃ <WH558> of Amaziah

וְיוֹאֵ֑ל <WH3100> And Joel וְיֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> and Jehu בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son י֣וֹשִׁבְיָ֔ה <WH3143> of Josibiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׂרָיָ֖ה <WH8304> of Seraiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲשִׂיאֵֽל׃ <WH6221> of Asiel

וְאֶלְיוֹעֵינַ֡י <WH454> And Elioenai וְֽיַעֲקֹ֡בָה <WH3291> and Jaakobah וִ֠ישׁוֹחָיָה <WH3439> and Jeshohaiah וַעֲשָׂיָ֧ה <WH6222> and Asaiah וַעֲדִיאֵ֛ל <WH5717> and Adiel וִישִׂימִאֵ֖ל <WH3450> and Jesimiel וּבְנָיָֽה׃ <WH1141> and Benaiah

וְזִיזָ֨א <WH2124> And Ziza בֶן־ <WH1121> the son שִׁפְעִ֧י <WH8230> of Shiphi בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אַלּ֛וֹן <WH438> of Allon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְדָיָ֥ה <WH3042> of Jedaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son שִׁמְרִ֖י <WH8113> of Shimri בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁמַֽעְיָֽה׃ <WH8098> of Shemaiah

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> these הַבָּאִ֣ים <WH935> These mentioned בְּשֵׁמ֔וֹת <WH8034> by [their] names נְשִׂיאִ֖ים <WH5387> [were] princes בְּמִשְׁפְּחוֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> in their families וּבֵית֙ <WH1004> and the house אֲב֣וֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1> of their fathers פָּרְצ֖וּ <WH6555> increased לָרֽוֹב׃ <WH7230> greatly

וַיֵּלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> went לִמְב֣וֹא <WH3996> to the entrance גְדֹ֔ר <WH1446> of Gedor עַ֖ד <WH5704> even לְמִזְרַ֣ח <WH4217> [even] unto the east side הַגָּ֑יְא <WH1516> of the valley לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> to seek מִרְעֶ֖ה <WH4829> pasture לְצֹאנָֽם׃ <WH6629> for their flocks

וַֽיִּמְצְא֤וּ <WH4672> And they found מִרְעֶה֙ <WH4829> pasture שָׁמֵ֣ן <WH8082> fat וָט֔וֹב <WH2896> and good וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and the land רַחֲבַ֣ת <WH7342> was broad יָדַ֔יִם <WH3027> able וְשֹׁקֶ֖טֶת <WH8252> and quiet וּשְׁלֵוָ֑ה <WH7961> and peaceable כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מִן־ <WH4480> for of חָ֔ם <WH2526> for [they] of Ham הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> had dwelt שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there לְפָנִֽים׃ <WH6440> there of old

וַיָּבֹ֡אוּ <WH935> came אֵלֶּה֩ <WH428> These הַכְּתוּבִ֨ים <WH3789> And these written בְּשֵׁמ֜וֹת <WH8034> by name בִּימֵ֣י ׀ <WH3117> in the days יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> of Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיַּכּ֨וּ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> אָהֳלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH168> their tents וְאֶת־ <WH853> [הַמְּעִינִים כ] (הַמְּעוּנִ֨ים <WH4586> Mehunim ק) אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who נִמְצְאוּ־ <WH4672> that were found שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> there וַיַּחֲרִימֻם֙ <WH2763> there and destroyed עַד־ <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> them utterly unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> and dwelt תַּחְתֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH8478> their place כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מִרְעֶ֥ה <WH4829> in their rooms because [there was] pasture לְצֹאנָ֖ם <WH6629> there for their flocks שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וּמֵהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH1992> like מִן־ <WH4480> from בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And [some] of them [even] of the sons שִׁמְע֗וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon הָלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> went לְהַ֣ר <WH2022> to mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> Seir אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> men חֲמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> five מֵא֑וֹת <WH3967> hundred וּפְלַטְיָ֡ה <WH6410> Pelatiah וּ֠נְעַרְיָה <WH5294> and Neariah וּרְפָיָ֧ה <WH7509> and Rephaiah וְעֻזִּיאֵ֛ל <WH5816> and Uzziel בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons יִשְׁעִ֖י <WH3469> of Ishi בְּרֹאשָֽׁם׃ <WH7218> having for their captains
